1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Token pattern.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Pattern
7  ( -- * Text token
8    pattern T,
9    pattern TUnk,
10    pattern TRaw,
11    pattern TSection,
12    pattern TQ,
13    pattern TQq,
14    pattern TKey,
15    pattern TBar,
16    pattern TLicense,
17
18    -- * Other token
19    pattern Term,
20  ) where
21
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token  as S
23
24-- | Text token.
25pattern T f w <- S.TText _ f w
26
27-- | Unknown text.
28pattern TUnk w <- T S.TextUnk w
29
30-- | Raw text.
31pattern TRaw w <- T S.TextRaw w
32
33-- | Section sign: @"==="@
34pattern TSection <- TRaw "==="
35
36-- | Single-quoted text.
37pattern TQ w <- T S.TextQ w
38
39-- | Double-quoted text.
40pattern TQq w <- T S.TextQQ w
41
42-- | Keyword text.
43pattern TKey w <- T S.TextKey w
44
45-- | Bar-enclosed text.
46pattern TBar w <- T S.TextBar w
47
48-- | License text.
49pattern TLicense w <- T S.TextLicense w
50
51-- | Term token.
52pattern Term w <- S.TTerm _ w
53
